author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is to update the trigger used for whole Run2 skim for monopole analysis

#### PR validation:
Skim was run already. This is to update the trigger name only. 2017/2018 triggers are the same.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:
This PR will need to backport as it will be used for UL processing.
title: Update triggers for Run2 monopole analysis
